notes.text: Viva — A Vida é uma Festa
a pun on "(Let) live" and "Hooray", with the subtitle "Life is a party"
The P.A. announcer can be heard calling this "Reentrada" in the dub, which is a closer translation to the original.

rowNotes.text: Gate inscriptions aren't localized in quick scenes where they're not the main focus.
Extra credit screens at the end of the movie in foreign versions.

notes.text: Wandering Oaken's Trading Post and Sauna
Armazém do Carvalho Errante e Spa

rowNotes.text: Cast section is localized amid the original credits.
Extra credit screens at the end of the movie in foreign versions.

notes.text: a pun on the adverbial form of "fun" ("funly") and "fun mind"

rowNotes.text: Extra credit screens at the end of the movie in foreign versions.

notes.text: N'ayons pas peur de faire peur
No susto e no grito fazemos bonito
こんどのぶたいは　きょうりゅうランド　なにやらあやしいこのしまで　またもや　ピーチひめが　すがたをけした。こいつはきっと　クッパのしわざ！
今度の舞台は恐竜ランド。なにやら怪しいこの島でまたもやピーチ姫が姿を消した。こいつはきっとクッパの仕業！
"This time, the setting is Dinosaur Land. Somehow, on this strange island, Princess Peach has once again vanished. This is surely Koopa's doing!
Welcome to Dinosaur Land! It seems that Princess Toadstool is missing...and that means Bowser must be up to his old tricks again!
欢迎来到恐龙大陆！看起来，桃花公主似乎又失踪了……一定是酷霸王又在耍他的老把戏了。
Welcome to Dinosaur Land! It seems that Princess Peach has disappeared again... It must be King Koopa playing his old tricks again.
かっぱやま　きいろスイッチ
河童山　黄色スイッチ
こんどのぶたいは　きょうりゅうランド　なにやらあやしい　このしまで　またもやピーチが　すがたをけした。こいつはきっと　クッパのしわざ！
今度の舞台は恐竜ランド。なにやら怪しいこの島でまたもやピーチが姿を消した。こいつはきっとクッパの仕業！
This time, the setting is Dinosaur Land. Somehow, on this strange island, Peach has once again vanished. This is surely Koopa's doing!
Welcome! This is Dinosaur Land. In this strange land we find that Princess Toadstool is missing again! Looks like Bowser is at it again!

rowNotes.text: "Monsieur Incroyable...!" Even though he still speaks the same lines in foreign versions (except in French), he's been dubbed over by other actors, presumably so he could react to Incrediboy's localized name.
Cast section is localized in an extra screen after the original credits.
Extra credit screens at the end of the movie in foreign versions.

notes.text: His secret identity is "Robert Parr", or "Bob Parr" for short.
His secret identity is "Roberto Pêra", or "Beto Pêra" for short.
Her secret identity is "Helen Truax", later "Helen Parr".
And your outfit is totally ridiculous!
E sua roupa é totalmente ridícula!
Le sauvetage finit en bataille juridique
Le sauvetage finit en bataille juridique
The preferred spelling would be "raios X" (plural, no hyphen).
Des rayons X au service d'un voyeur ?
$uper damage$ / Another bold rescue ends in disaster, landmark damaged, scores injured
Edna Mode later refers to him as "Dinamite" in the dub.
Edna Mode later refers to him as "Ultraman" in the dub.
Public Safe Again / Public Opinion Polls Show 85% in favor of Super Relocation Act
Le public à nouveau en sécurité
The narrator reads this more naturally as "onde eles estão agora?" (swapped word order) in the dub.
Mr.[ミスター]インクレディブル
Number is spelled out, as is preferred in Portuguese.
Still only reflects the first dub, which isn't the currently distributed version.

rowNotes.text: Foreign versions include assets in a variety of languages in the same shot, but the original only features English text. The "Doing our part!" poster and the Life magazine cover have had the American flag background changed.
Text is replaced by graphics. The original shot also includes a camera pan, which is not present in foreign versions.
Text is replaced by graphics. The original shot also includes a camera pan, which is not present in foreign versions.

notes.text: ありがとうミスター・インクレディブル

rowNotes.text: Screen is not localized on scenes where it's not the main focus.
A missed opportunity for localization, since the text is read out loud by Bob.

notes.text: Rules & Regulations / Insuricare / Employee Handbook / Volume XI

Island operations / Finances / Omnidroid metatraining / Supers
Project Kronos Countdown / 08 hours : 10 minutes : 42 seconds until launch
Signal source: remote control / Destroy remote

rowNotes.text: Cast section is fully localized amid the original credits.
Extra credit screens at the end of the movie in foreign versions.

notes.text: Um filme da Pixar Animation Studios
Last week of August / Welcome to the town of Grand Basin / Carnival Days / A week of games, rides, and celebration / For the whole family
Sorry, we're closed / Second Chance Antiques / Est. 1986
Desculpe, estamos fechados / Segunda Chance Antiquário / Desde 1986
More naturally worded in the dub as "Antiquário Segunda Chance" (swapped word order).
We are best friends, my Gabby and me. Each afternoon we break for tea.
Nós somos melhores amigas, minha Gabby e eu. Todas as tardes tomamos chá juntas.
Translated literally, without employing rhyme or a meter pattern.
I tell her my [problems.] She always [listens.] / In [...] we're always [...]
Eu falo dos meus [problemas.] Ela sempre me [escuta.]
The space for the second stanza has been left blank.

rowNotes.text: Extra credit screens at the end of the movie in foreign versions.

notes.text: a pun on "Up — High-Up Adventures" and "Up — Heaps of Adventure"
Paradise Falls, a land lost in time
Paraíso das Cachoeiras, um lugar perdido no tempo
Waterfall Paradise, a place lost in time
Ellie reads it out loud in a closer translation in the dub: "Paraíso das Cachoeiras, uma terra perdida no tempo" (noun change)
Les chutes du Paradis, une terre perdue
Ellie reads it out loud in a closer translation in the dub: "Les chutes du Paradis, une terre où le temps s'est arrêté"
Thanks for the adventure — now go have a new one! Love, Ellie
Obrigada pela aventura. Agora parta pra próxima! Com amor, Ellie
Merci pour cette belle aventure — Il est temps pour toi d'en vivre une nouvelle! Je t'aime, Ellie
